variantManagement.description:
variantManagement defines how the variant management of page personalizations is controlled.
- None - No variant management by default.
- Control - Individual personalizations for each control.

initialLoad.description: initialLoad defines whether or not the data in the table is automatically loaded. The default value is true.

type.description: Use type to define the table type. Note: Grid tables, analytical tables, and tree tables cannot be rendered on smartphones. Instead, responsive tables always show on smartphones.

creationMode.description: Defines the page behavior when a new record is created.

personalization.description: The personalization attribute can be set to false to hide the table personalization button.

selectionMode.description: The selection mode for table rows. The default is multi - multiple rows can be selected.

name.description:
The name property of TableCreationMode defines the creation mode; possible values are:
- NewPage: The create action leads to a new page.
- Inline: The create action leads to a new row at the table.
- CreationRow: No create button will be rendered, an empty row is directly given.
The default is "NewPage".

createAtEnd.description: In case of inline creation mode you can decide if the new row will be created at the end of the table, or direcly after the currently selected table.
